name: DM
queryCode:
SELECT
    t1.BCODE,
    t1.MDEPTCODE,
    t1.MDEPTID,
    t1.MDEPTNAME,
    t1.ORGCODE,
    t1.ORGID,
    t1.ORGNAME,
    t1.PERSONNAME,
    t1.USERID,
    t1.USERNAME
FROM (SELECT
          d.BUSINESS_CATEGORY as BCODE,
          d.DEPARTMENT_NUMBER as MDEPTCODE,
          t1.MDEPARTMENT_ID as MDEPTID,
          d.DEPARTMENT_NAME as MDEPTNAME,
          o.ORGANIZATION_NUMBER as ORGCODE,
          t1.ORGANIZATION_ID as ORGID,
          o.ORGANIZATION_NAME as ORGNAME,
          t1.DISPLAY_NAME as PERSONNAME,
          t1.ID as USERID,
          t1.UID as USERNAME
      FROM sys_person t1 left join sys_organization o on t1.ORGANIZATION_ID = o.ID
      left join sys_department d on t1.MDEPARTMENT_ID = d.ID
     ) t1
